title: Submission of the Gazette Notifications published under the Revenue Protection Act, No.19 of 1962 and the Customs Ordinance (Chapter 235) for approval of Parliament
decision_details:
- Approval of the Cabinet has been received at the Cabinet meeting held on 2024 12-09 to impose a Customs Import Duty of 30% on the import of motor vehicles in parallel with the lifting of the temporary suspension on the importation of such vehicles. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Planning and Economic Development to submit the following Orders published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notifications, to Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet:

* 	Revenue Protection Order No. 01/2025 under section 2 of the Revenue Protection Act No. 19 of 1962 published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2421/05 dated 2025.01.27.

* 	Order made under section 10(A) of the Customs Ordinance, (Chapter 235), published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2421/43 dated 2025.01.31.
